Returns: True if bound action is inside @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#GuidedAction#getSubActions_E@, false otherwise.

getDescriptionView().Description: Returns the description view within this view holder's view.

Returns: Current editing title view or description view or activator view or null if not in editing.

getEditableTitleView().Description: Convenience method to return an editable version of the title, if possible, or null if the title view isn't an EditText.

isInEditingTitle().Description: Returns true if the TextView is in editing title, false otherwise.

GuidedActionsStylist.ViewHolder(android..Description: Constructs an ViewHolder and caches the relevant subviews.

getTitleView().Description: Returns the title view within this view holder's view.

getContentView().Description: Returns the content view within this view holder's view, where title and description are shown.

Returns: Facet implementation for the facetClass or null if feature not implemented.
Parameters: Class: Facet classes to query, examples are: class of @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#ItemAlignmentFacet_E@.

getEditableDescriptionView().Description: Convenience method to return an editable version of the description, if possible, or null if the description view isn't an EditText.

getCheckmarkView().Description: Returns the checkmark view within this view holder's view.

Returns: True if in editing title, description, so IME would be open, false otherwise.
isInEditingText().Description: Returns true if in editing title, description, so IME would be open.

getChevronView().Description: Returns the chevron view within this view holder's view.

getIconView().Description: Returns the icon view within this view holder's view.

isInEditing().Description: Returns true if in editing title, description, or activator View, false otherwise.

isInEditingActivatorView().Description: Returns true if is in editing activator view with id guidedactions_activator_item, false otherwise.

isInEditingDescription().Description: Returns true if the TextView is in editing description, false otherwise.

ClassDesc: ViewHolder caches information about the action item layouts' subviews. Subclasses of @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#GuidedActionsStylist_E@ may also wish to subclass this in order to add fields.
